title: Jeff Farias Show - June 24, 2008 (24kbs Audio).mp3
description:
Tuesday, June 24. 2008

at 3:30 Cliff Schecter was in NYC on a promotional tour for his book The Real McCain and will be back with us next week.

at 4 PM Texas State Senator Leticia Van de Putte joins us to announce that the DNC Convention in Denver will be simulcast in spanish.
more on the planning for the Dem Convention here

at 4:30 Scott Roberts & Jeremy Wagener, filmmakers of GasHole - This timely, hot-button film takes an intense look at oil prices and the future of alternative fuels. The film has a special screening event at The Christown 14 Theatres on Wednesdsay, June 25th, at 7:00pm with a Q & A session with the filmmakers to follow the screening. Tickets are $10.00 for general & $8.00 for Seniors/Students.


Also try listening to Thom Hartmann,  Randi Rhodes,  Ed Schultz and Mike Malloy
